experience.summary: Initially hired as a graphic designer, my role gradually shifted towards full-stack development. In that time I developed multiple REST APIs for use by third parties including a service for providing meteorological data from Environment Canada and a service for retrieving near real-time radio station song data. My responsibilities also included provisioning Linux servers and supporting business critical infrastructure and applications. Various front-end tasks have come my way such as custom Joomla theme and module development with a focus on responsiveness and providing a top notch mobile experience.
Worked with a team of designers to bring their vision to life using JavaScript, HTML and CSS. Most often this included custom WordPress theme and plugin development.

projects.name: CityLeash
projects.summary: CityLeash.com aims to provide pet owners with an easy way to find the best pet friendly apartments throughout the United States.  During development I participated in a front-end role focused on responsiveness, styling, and user interactions. It's officially launched, but still a work in progress.
